div.p: Per Governor Baker's announcement on March 31, 2020 McAuliffe will be closed through May 4, 2020. This is a fluid situation that we are closely monitoring. Updates will be posted as we have them.

svg.desc: Used for the like, share, comment, and reaction icons

p.span: Love seeing this #positivenews! We are looking forward to welcoming Daniel and his family to the McAuliffe Crew this fall! 🥰

p.a: Photo of the Day: Honk For Joy - Framingham SOURCE

div.span: FRAMINGHAM – Eleven-year-old Daniel Miscia has been trying to bring joy to his Framingham neighborhood in the middle of this

p.span:
Thanks to Helen, McAuliffe’s Wellness teacher, for this great game.
Mental Wellness Tic-Tac-Toe
- Choose 3 boxes and do the activity described in each box.
- See if you can get 3 in a row!
- To play with a friend, take turns choosing a box and doing the activities together until someone wins tic-tac-toe. - Each activity is designed to inspire creativity, reduce stress, and help your brain get into a state of flow. *** Made for middle school students in Wellness class, but might be fun/useful for anyone
#edthataddsup #weareinthistogether

img.alt:
Thanks to Helen, McAuliffe’s Wellness teacher, for this great game.
Mental Wellness Tic-Tac-Toe - Choose 3 boxes and do the activity described in each box. - See if you can get 3 in a row! - To play with a friend, take turns choosing a box and doing the activities together until someone wins tic-tac-toe. - Each activity is designed to inspire creativity, reduce stress, and help your brain get into a state of flow. *** Made for middle school students in Wellness class, but might be fun/useful for anyone #edthataddsup #weareinthistogether

p.span: The Christa McAuliffe Charter School (McAuliffe) may not and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, gender identity, religion, sexual orientation, disability, homelessness, or English language proficiency (M.G.L. c. 71, § 89(m); 603 CMR 1.06(l)). For questions about compliance or to communicate a grievance, please contact the individuals listed below who together serve to coordinate compliance under Title IX and Section 504.
